## CanvasCartesian2dUpdateArgProvider class

Canvas implementation of [ICartesian2dUpdateArgProvider](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dupdateargprovider.md)<!-- -->, inverts the Y direction as canvas expects the origin to be in the top left corner.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CanvasCartesian2dUpdateArgProvider<TRequiredTraits> implements ICartesian2dUpdateArgProvider<Float64Array, TRequiredTraits> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ICartesian2dUpdateArgProvider](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dupdateargprovider.md)<!-- -->&lt;Float64Array, TRequiredTraits&gt;
